item.title: Oprah Winfrey: 4 Ways to Be More Successful–and Happier
item.description: Perspectives from Oprah on finding greater purpose, meaning, intention, and confidence.

item.title: Why People Who’ve Failed Make the Best Employees
item.description: Setbacks and challenges often build resilience that makes some applicants great at sales and exceptional assets to a business.

item.title: Why Some AI Leaders Say Artificial General Intelligence Is Already Here
item.description: Nvidia CEO and co-founder Jensen Huang and AI researchers say AGI is here or close to arriving. Here’s what that means for businesses.

item.title: President Trump’s Tariff Dividends Could Juice the Stock Market Just Like Pandemic Stimulus Checks
item.description: New stimulus checks could fuel asset prices like they did during the pandemic.

item.title: Toxic Self-Improvement: What Is It and What Are the Signs?
item.description: When any of these 8 signs indicate your efforts to do better are making you feel worse, it’s time to ease up.
